Name: Legend of Fae
About the game: Sea Cross Island was a quiet haven just off the mainland, but recently strange things have been happening! Mysterious creatures known as Fae have started appearing and are wreaking havoc. A young girl named Claudia, is thrust into adventure as she searches for her missing uncle amongst the chaos. It's a dangerous journey but she's not without friends. Four elementals are drawn to her aid as Claudia finds out that sheâ€™s actually a sorceress! Embark on a journey to discover the secret behind the mysterious Faery Gates. Key features: 50 + levels Upgrade customization Cute Monsters! Active time puzzle combat! Boss Battles!
